amendment.description: An amendment numbered 145 printed in the Congressional Record to add to the end of the bill an additional paragraph that the plan required by paragraph (1) shall not include oil and gas leasing on any protected public lands.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add to the end of the bill an additional paragraph that the plan required by paragraph (1) shall not include oil and gas leasing on any protected public lands.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 218 (Roll no. 89).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A070) offered by Mr. Grijalva.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A070) Failed by recorded vote: 210 - 218 (Roll no. 89).
